timeline.bodyText:
We can remove this statement since 'Mapping1' element is being tested by mouseOver event in line 328. Such redundant steps should be removed because actions like Click or mouseOver does the needful and will fail if the element is not available in the document.
Rest all looks really good and tests pass as well.
timeline.author: xnikhil08

timeline.message: Placement of new card in Curate

timeline.bodyText:
Looks like we are creating same helper function in both mapping and load card components to sort the cards based on updated date. I am thinking that this will also be used for match, merge and Custom cards probably, so let's move it to a common place like utils/data-conversion or utils/conversionFunctions or any other curation related helper file within utils and then simply import & re-use it in all the required components respectively.
And let's name it as "sortCardsByUpdated" perhaps.
timeline.author: xnikhil08

replies.bodyText: Great point @xnikhil08. Moved the helper function into utils/conversionFunctions.tsx and imported it in the respective Load and Map card components
